card.description:
We are advocates for Freedom over Fascism. 

Billionaire bought justices and the wealthy few are striving to strip us of our fundamental rights and liberties. Their aim is not to represent us, but to rule over us. They employ illicit schemes to swindle, suppress, and undermine the voice of the majority of Americans. 

Our response is to unite, reveal their dishonesty, demand transparency and accountability from those in power, and ardently support Independence over Totalitarianism.
 
We are a group of people who believe in the possibility of change and work to make it happen.

card.title:
About Face on Instagram: "#Repost @butchanarchy
„Éª„Éª„Éª
Protestor‚Äôs Guide for Talking to the National Guard. 
.
This is was not made to in any way encourage people to go up to active, deployed guard members. Doing so is extremely dangerous. This is made in the understanding that some people will do so, and so I believe it‚Äôs best to have the information and resources on how to do so most effectively available and well-known. This is also not an attempt to excuse military violence done here or abroad, or make it seem like that violence is somehow not as bad as police violence. Police and military violence are both arms of the State that allow it to maintain its sovereignty. However, there IS sometimes a material difference between the people who decide to join the military, and the people who decide to join the police. There is also a rich history of people who radicalized because of the violence they saw while enlisted, as well as a history of radical defection and resistance by people enlisted. This IS a recognition of that reality, AND the reality that if conflicts continue as they have throughout this country, we will likely see more of a military presence in our communities, and it is imperative, imo, that we begin to have a better understanding of that presence and the contradictions and areas of conflict within those forces so we can do our best to fragment and even shatter the ability of those forces to assert their power over us.
.
A graphic made from the information in the guide put together by the GI Rights Hotline, War Resistors League, and About Face: Veterans Against the War. You can find the full guide here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1MyrRVdPq3I-r2JOOnfdSaSrPgQV8S3wK/view
.
Another guide for military members who are concerned about being deployed against protests: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1c7uZE3B2yF24ygQVKlhLVPrzTXYSZlDZ/view
.
Both of which can be found in this shared folder filled with guides and printable flyers and graphics: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/mobile/folders/104vpKI7tVE0vl_NLM1LKAG55wSybufzI
.
Article ‚ÄúTroops: Stand Down for Black Lives‚Äù : https://couragetoresist.org/troops-stand-down-for-black-lives/
.
#blm #uprising #acab"
